name: Vroom Vroom (RustyMew)
description:
Are ya ready for a rip-roarin’ high-speed n’ octane racin’ experience!? Well, start yer engines, cuz Vroom Vroom is speedin’ right into yer fingertips, YEE-HAW!!! No weaponry or other BS is used in these races, it’s all just pure skill in this top-down racer!

-Choose from 5 of our latest and greatest high-speed machines!

-Drive along 4 CRRRRRRAZY* tracks!

-Wild, friendship-destroying, competitive action!

-A sense of humor (kind of)!

-Car!

*very subjective

Join the Discord server: https://discord.gg/QJSm6kBQpX
